dict.acceptation: 制服；军服；通讯中用以代表字母 u 的词；
（形状，性质等）一样的；规格一致的；始终如一的；
使规格一律；使均一；使穿制服；

sent.orig: Public opinion in our country is at once uniform and non-uniform.
sent.trans: 我们的舆论，是一律，又是不一律。

sent.orig: In uniform filed, breakdown voltage changed more, but less change in non-uniform field.
sent.trans: 在非均匀电场中，击穿电压提高不明显。

sent.orig: Sometimes the kilt also part of the school uniform or is part of the scout uniform.
sent.trans: 方格裙还是学校制服或童子军制服的一种。

sent.orig: The development history of military uniform and fashionable status of uniform style are introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了军装的产生和发展历史、军戎风格流行的现状。

sent.orig: The uniform law must have the uniform interpretation.
sent.trans: 统一的法律必须有统一的解释。
